API Reference
=============

This section documents the public Python API of the project for developers who
integrate or extend the codebase. It summarizes key modules and their primary
entry points.

Modules overview
----------------

- ``oc_lettings_site.views``: ``index``, ``custom_404``, ``custom_500``, ``sentry_debug``
- ``lettings.models``: ``Address``, ``Letting``
- ``lettings.views``: ``index``, ``letting``
- ``profiles.models``: ``Profile``
- ``profiles.views``: ``index``, ``profile``

For a deeper look at internals, see :doc:`reference`.
